lexUnit.name: mug.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the amount of contents of a large cup, typically cylindrical and with a handle and used without a saucer

sentence.text: Nothing important , Piper the Trog said , handing me a full mug of cider .
I took a mug of water to clean my teeth , shave , and take a bath .
I made a mug of decaf and sat looking round at the crumbling plaster ceiling , the curdled paintwork , the tatty carpet and the flophouse furnishings .
When he had remained in his bed to at least 6.30am he was praised and given a big mug of chocolate .
For a moment , she said nothing , but sat watching him pour out a mug of beer ; then she said bitterly , ` You 're an ungrateful devil .
Endless afternoon teas when we discussed giving mugs of hot chocolate to needy children at Christmas time or whose turn it was to do the flowers in the Maternity Hospital .
` Got some hold over him she has , I swear , " Gwyneth continued , taking the mug of wine her mother handed her .
It may not go with a tableful of curry , but a mug of cold beer is not what I need .
All eyes in the room were watching the stranger -- except for a pair belonging to Rincewind the wizard , who was sitting in the darkest comer nursing a mug of very small beer .
I brewed a mug of tea using the small block of tea , milk and sugar , crushed into a mess tin of water and brought to the boil .
My catering was limited to brewing endless mugs of insipid coffee and opening packets of custard creams .
After drinking a mug of tea , I packed away the tent and set off , watching the trees float nearer as the pale sun thawed the earth .
Once everyone had drunk a mug of hot strong tea , he sent his own men out to feed and check the stock which was kept down at Cherry Tree Farm .
The police were a minute or two behind but , before the inevitable string of questions began , I insisted on making and drinking a huge mug of tea .
She looked at Ruth drinking a mug of tea at the table .
` Here you are , luv , " said Aunt Bedelia giving me a mug of cocoa and some bread and mousetrap cheese .
I made Joanna respectable by putting up my anchor lantern , made myself a mug of cocoa , and turned in .
Give him a mug of cocoa and a big kiss and send him on a month 's leave .
Anna was bending over him , holding out a mug of coffee .
He opened his eyes and sat up in bed as Anna came in holding a mug of coffee .
A man in overalls and a hard hat was sitting drinking a mug of coffee .
Sergeant Morrison put his mug of tea down on the greasy bar and turned .
When she had gone , Sarah poured herself out a large mug of thick black tea .
